RelatedSentence: PETALING JAYA : MMC Corporation Bhd says its subsidiary , MMC Engineering Services Sdn Bhd , along with Siemens Aktiengesellschaft and Siemens Malaysia Sdn Bhd , has landed a RM300mil contract for the Rapid Project in Pengerang , Johor .
MMC did not specify when work was set to begin , but said completion was expected to be by the middle of 2017 .
